content:
I think I'll go with a mix of strawberries, blueberries, grapes, and pineapple for my fruit salad. Those fruits are all in season and will complement the fruit flavors in the Sangria nicely. Thanks for the tips on how to make a good fruit salad!

By the way, I was thinking of making some homemade chocolate chip cookies to serve alongside the snacks and fruit salad. Do you have any tips on how to make the perfect chocolate chip cookie?
